0.1.name: wordpress/waypoint-hd-weather-widget
0.1.description:
Hacking: John Grefe - Twitter Google +
Design: James Steward - Twitter Google +

Group: The Waypoint - http://consultants.thewaypoint.com

This plugin uses HD 331dp images, in beautiful responsive cirlces, to display weather for your location. You'll need an image kit from us (a single is provided), email me john.grefe@thewaypoint.com for a set (~24mg)

The plugin parses data from the openweather api to display information. The HD background image changes, based on the 'condition' outside, better named here, the "Feels". We have provided one Feel in
